titlestmt.titleproper: Smith-Houston-Ogden family papers. Unidentified and miscellaneous papers (series 82) 1732-1977
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Smith-Houston-Ogden family papers. Unidentified and miscellaneous papers (series 82)

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers documenting the Smith and Houston families. Materials in the collection include: photographs; family trees; magazine articles and newsletters; school essays; correspondence; checks and checkbooks, ledgers, agreements, deeds and leases from the Estate of Mary Smith; deeds, indentures, and surveys; bills and receipts, accounts; notebooks with extracts from Latin and English language documents referring to Houston family ancestors (Scottish, Irish, English, American); letterbook (1789-1793); genealogy notes; materials related to the estates of Sarah Logan and Gertrude Gouverneur Smith; a small number of audiocassettes of oral histories; and mementos, including locks of hair, of various Smith family members.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
